meanings.definition: A person who refrains from doing something.
meanings.sent1: The refrainers in the group decided not to eat any more cake.
meanings.sent2: The refrainers at the party chose not to drink alcohol.
meanings.sent3: The refrainers made a pact to resist the temptation of the delicious desserts.
meanings.sent4: She was a refrainer when it came to gossip, always keeping her lips sealed.
meanings.sent5: The image of the refrainers standing strong against peer pressure was inspiring.

meanings.definition: Those who abstain or hold back from a particular action or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The refrainers from the team skipped the celebratory pizza party.
meanings.sent2: In a group of singers, the refrainers from singing were noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The refrainers from the dance floor enjoyed watching others have fun.
meanings.sent4: The refrainers from technology found solace in nature's simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The concept of refrainers from negative thoughts helped maintain peace of mind.
